patchNotes.title: Hero changes and talent rework

texts.text: Leap of Faith active won't cancel any channeling abilities anymore.
subtexts: If you pull an <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 0, etc> he will continue to do it. If you pull an  <vanilla, abilities, heroic, 1, illidan> he will continue to cast it

texts.text: Changed functionality: (CHANGES ONLY TO PURSUED BY GRACE) Damaging an enemy Hero increases Movement Speed by 2.5% and heals by 3.75% for 6 seconds. These effects stack up to 8 times.

general.developerCommentary: The concept of this change was to change how the speed tier on level 13 would work and also preventing the active to cancel skills to lessen the frustation of players and incentivize some new plays

patchNotes.developerCommentary: For me Anduin is a great hero that is cursed a little on how his <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> works and it's not because the skill itself is bad but it causes a little frustation sometimes with the 'no consent' type of skill. His kit overall is fun but i want to change it to something more inclined to how i would want Anduin to be so here is more like a preference than anything. The truly problematic part of his kit i would say that lies on level 13-16 on how good <vanilla, abilities, trait, 0> talents are AND equally fun

texts.text: Moved from level 7
Additional functionality: Anduin receive 100% attack speed bonus for the next two basic attacks.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 0>

texts.text: Changed functionality: If Flash Heal is used at a stunned, rooted or silenced target it will be recast after 2 seconds on the same target. If <modified, abilities, trait, 0> cooldown is available the second healing is increased by 100%
subtexts: The increased healing effect will be applied if you used the flash heal with the <modified, abilities, trait, 0> cooldown available not when the second heal is applied.

texts.text: moved from level 16

changes.developerCommentary: Making that talent to have a different usage from the others

texts.text: Moved to level 7
Removed

changes.name: NEW: <modified, talents, 4, 0>

texts.text: Anduin can use <modified, abilities, basic, 0> on a chastized enemy dealing damage instead and launching basic attacks on close enemy heroes

changes.developerCommentary: I didn't want to make it too similar to <vanilla, talents, 4, 0, uther> so i made it more situational and powerful

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 1>

texts.text: Basic attacks bonus now applies against any root

changes.developerCommentary: Instead of going off the board i wanted to make this

texts.text: Moved to level 13
Moved from level 1

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 1>

texts.text: Increases cooldown from 10 seconds to 15 seconds
During the healing Anduin is immune to Silences and Slows

changes.developerCommentary: This is supposed to give Anduin a tool to prevent certain types of engage to suceed against him but not all of them.

texts.text: Moved to level 1
Movement speed bonus is now stacking
Passive: Basic Attacks against enemies gives 10% movement speed to the closest hero to Anduin for 1 second.

changes.name: NEW: <modified, talents, 13, 1>

texts.text: The healing done by <modified, abilities, basic, 1> Star and Basic Attacks will be converted on temporary max health that lasts 6 seconds.
subtexts: This will also apply bonus to <modified, talents, 16, 1> and <modified, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Passive: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes heal the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for 32.

changes.developerCommentary: The intent here was to buff <vanilla, talents, 1, 1> but also being different

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 0>

texts.text: Moved from level 4
Changed Passive: Basic Attacks burn enemy heroes for 87 damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

changes.developerCommentary: I just find those two very suitable one to the other

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 2>

texts.text: removed

changes.developerCommentary: As said before i it's a preference change for Anduin and i dislike how strong this combo is naturally for Anduin.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 1>

texts.text: Additional functionality: also explodes at the apex.

changes.developerCommentary: I like the concept of this talent and i love the interaction the <vanilla, abilities, basic, 1> but i wanted it to be more appealing.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 3>

texts.text: Won't increase the healing of <modified, abilities, basic, 0> anymore neither will reset the cooldown
Additional functionality: Receive all level 1 talents

changes.developerCommentary: <vanilla, talents, 16, 3> would have an hard time being balanced on being an super heal without being compared to <vanilla, talents, 10, 0, rehgar> so with the changes on level 1 tier i think it's enough to justify it's existence plus being fun.

texts.text: Moved to level 1

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3> renamed to <modified, talents, 20, 3>

texts.text: Changed functionality: A holy area surrounds Anduin. Every time he basic attacks an enemy hero all allied units within this area are healed by 1% of their maximum health.
subtexts: Radius will be 5 | <vanilla, talents, 10, 1, blaze> is 6.5

changes.developerCommentary: I was reading through all the talents from discipline and holy priest from WoW and this one got my attention. Big fan.
